name: noodl-utils
description: Utility/helpers for working with NOODL values
author: Christopher Tran <pfftdammitchris@gmail.com>

scripts.test: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig.test.json" NODE_ENV=test ts-mocha -r ts-node/register --extensions ts --watch --watch-files src src/**/*.test.ts --verbose
scripts.test:file: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig.test.json" NODE_ENV=test ts-mocha -r ts-node/register --extensions ts --watch --watch-files src
